名義上做港元txn係無break US sanction

11. Who must comply with OFAC regulations?

U.S. persons must comply with OFAC regulations, including all U.S. citizens and permanent resident aliens regardless of where they are located, all persons and entities within the United States, all U.S. incorporated entities and their foreign branches. In the cases of certain programs, foreign subsidiaries owned or controlled by U.S. companies also must comply. Certain programs also require foreign persons in possession of U.S.-origin goods to comply. [01-15-15]

https://www.treasury.gov/resource-center/faqs/Sanctions/Pages/faq_general.aspx#basic
自己睇啦屌你

replies.msg:
其實果位巴打某程度上又無講錯既

巴打你quote得岩，呢個的確係OFAC Sanctions既覆蓋範圍，但可惜中銀唔係incorp係美國，所以佢唔算係US Person，唔需要跟美國法律；就算佢有間Sub/Branch係美國incorp/physically present in US，因為中銀同時要跟支那既法律，係好有機會出現conflict of law，e.g. 呢間sub/branch係要凍結呢堆人既資產，但可惜中共法律唔俾，就會有個好尷尬既情況發生。有興趣的可以參考"EU Block Statues"，佢係講有關歐盟同美國對伊朗制裁既分別，當中就係軒涉到Conflict of Law呢個Topic。

簡單D黎講，只要林奠同果班仆街係香港或者非locate係美國國土/非美資既銀行開acct，唔用任何美金有關既野，OFAC Sanctions真係吹佢唔漲的。當然，佢地被美國制裁係會有一定既阻嚇力，有D銀行會驚，做KYC果時見你比美國制裁都唔會再敢同佢地做生意。

但，好彩既係呢條EO 13936係Based on HK Autonomy Act (HKAA)，HKAA Section 5 有講到一樣野叫"Secondary Sanctions"。佢俾OFAC一個權力就係：邊間銀行同呢幾條仆街做Trade，就算佢地係non-US Person俾美國周到都可以擺佢落OFAC sanctions list。而HKAA講明話10月Secretary of State要交一堆名，到時就精彩喇中銀或者其他中資行，又或者其他同呢班仆街有交易既銀行要係支那政治壓力vs無得再用美金清算呢個兩難局面做抉擇，咁就睇下佢地會企邊邊

而有個巴打提過payment screening。screening system用既sanctions list好大程度上係取決於間銀行既jurisdiction，currency，同埋佢跟邊到既law。例子就係，中銀幫林奠轉十萬人民幣俾建行，首先中銀同CITIC唔係US persons，其次無用美金所以唔會經美資行做結算，呢兩間銀行係絕對可以唔screen OFAC List against this payment

利申：做過下sanctions Compliance，可以一齊討論下

11. Who must comply with OFAC regulations?

U.S. persons must comply with OFAC regulations, including all U.S. citizens and permanent resident aliens regardless of where they are located, all persons and entities within the United States, all U.S. incorporated entities and their foreign branches. In the cases of certain programs, foreign subsidiaries owned or controlled by U.S. companies also must comply. Certain programs also require foreign persons in possession of U.S.-origin goods to comply. [01-15-15]

https://www.treasury.gov/resource-center/faqs/Sanctions/Pages/faq_general.aspx#basic

quote.msg: 名義上做港元txn係無break US sanction

11. Who must comply with OFAC regulations?

U.S. persons must comply with OFAC regulations, including all U.S. citizens and permanent resident aliens regardless of where they are located, all persons and entities within the United States, all U.S. incorporated entities and their foreign branches. In the cases of certain programs, foreign subsidiaries owned or controlled by U.S. companies also must comply. Certain programs also require foreign persons in possession of U.S.-origin goods to comply. [01-15-15]

https://www.treasury.gov/resource-center/faqs/Sanctions/Pages/faq_general.aspx#basic
自己睇啦屌你

其實果位巴打某程度上又無講錯既

巴打你quote得岩，呢個的確係OFAC Sanctions既覆蓋範圍，但可惜中銀唔係incorp係美國，所以佢唔算係US Person，唔需要跟美國法律；就算佢有間Sub/Branch係美國incorp/physically present in US，因為中銀同時要跟支那既法律，係好有機會出現conflict of law，e.g. 呢間sub/branch係要凍結呢堆人既資產，但可惜中共法律唔俾，就會有個好尷尬既情況發生。有興趣的可以參考"EU Block Statues"，佢係講有關歐盟同美國對伊朗制裁既分別，當中就係軒涉到Conflict of Law呢個Topic。

簡單D黎講，只要林奠同果班仆街係香港或者非locate係美國國土/非美資既銀行開acct，唔用任何美金有關既野，OFAC Sanctions真係吹佢唔漲的。當然，佢地被美國制裁係會有一定既阻嚇力，有D銀行會驚，做KYC果時見你比美國制裁都唔會再敢同佢地做生意。

但，好彩既係呢條EO 13936係Based on HK Autonomy Act (HKAA)，HKAA Section 5 有講到一樣野叫"Secondary Sanctions"。佢俾OFAC一個權力就係：邊間銀行同呢幾條仆街做Trade，就算佢地係non-US Person俾美國周到都可以擺佢落OFAC sanctions list。而HKAA講明話10月Secretary of State要交一堆名，到時就精彩喇中銀或者其他中資行，又或者其他同呢班仆街有交易既銀行要係支那政治壓力vs無得再用美金清算呢個兩難局面做抉擇，咁就睇下佢地會企邊邊

而有個巴打提過payment screening。screening system用既sanctions list好大程度上係取決於間銀行既jurisdiction，currency，同埋佢跟邊到既law。例子就係，中銀幫林奠轉十萬人民幣俾建行，首先中銀同CITIC唔係US persons，其次無用美金所以唔會經美資行做結算，呢兩間銀行係絕對可以唔screen OFAC List against this payment

利申：做過下sanctions Compliance，可以一齊討論下
